hero.core_tension: Choose timed collaboration pop-ups that shift purchase timing without cutting margin, or run broad discounts that buy traffic but compress full-price demand.
hero.setting: In-store strategy table. Low three-quarter angle on operator leaning over a matte wood table with calendar pages for Nov 24	6 Dec 08, printed partner briefs, and sample QR stickers; tactile materials and linen swatches visible to imply product curation.
hero.persona: Head of Retail or Head of Marketing executing the collab-led approach
hero.action: Placing a 'partner pop-up' token on the Nov 24	6 Dec 08 window while leaving shallow-discount tags in a separate pile to signal test scope
hero.urgency_symbol: A small analog countdown timer set to the first activation weekend and a clipped calendar page for the two-week window
props: Partner mood boards labeled S5 (Gen Z pop-up)
QR sticker sheets and a printed measurement spine showing early-window share targets
One shallow markdown tag to show limited discount test scope
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, clear subject shadowing, and a clean negative space to the right for copy or captions
hero.alt: Head of Retail placing partner pop-up token, choosing collab-led test with QR activation

case_study_1.moment: Head of Marketing watches first dozen QR scans in real time at the door as staff greet under-30 visitors; a small counter shows QR redemption rising toward the 5% floor.
case_study_1.persona: Head of Marketing running S5 collaborator pop-ups aimed at Gen Z
props: Prominent QR signage tied to an exclusive early-window drop
Printed cohort tags to separate new vs repeat buyers

case_study_1.alt: Head of Marketing monitoring QR redemptions at Gen Z pop-up test

case_study_2.scene: Weekend 'store-as-studio' activation with partner crew filming short-form content in a branded corner. Staff hand out partner-funded sample cards with QR codes.
case_study_2.moment: Head of Partnerships reviews footfall counters and partner media placements as a crew wraps a short clip; on-paper yield per visitor metrics are compared to baseline.
case_study_2.persona: Head of Partnerships coordinating S6 store-as-studio weekend activations
props: Lightweight camera rig and branded backdrop
Partner media schedule and a printed partner_value ledger
Kiosk with QR scan log and per-visitor yield printouts

case_study_2.alt: Head of Partnerships tracking footfall uplift and QR scans during store-as-studio weekend
